reviews.review_msg: Elspeth's approach to creation in this class was invaluable! She really inspires one to create thoughtfully, with attention to process and exploration, avoiding the preciousness of an ultimate piece. She leaves you to your own devices if she sees you challenging yourself, but is always available. She's an absolute delight. Highly recommended!

Elspeth has definitely changed the way I approach my artwork, her explaination of process is enlightening and she is the nicest person in the world on top of everything. A really great teacher for an otherwise slightly boring course. I would always recommend her to anybody

Great teacher.. I love that everything that she has taught me is what I wanted to learn in the first place.. What it is most important is loving what we do not for its aesthetics but for the true meaning of art. Has made me love art even more! THUMBS UP

I don't know why people complain...she's a wonderful, passionate teacher who assigns projects that are challenging yet really interesting. DO NOT take a class with her if you aren't open to experimenting, and/or take yourself too seriously! she won't tell you much from the start, but this is university, and you're expected to ask questions...
AMAZING PROF!!!  She's totally interested in helping students find their own unique 'voice' or style - not a uniform, cookie-cutter approach at all!  SHE ROCKS!!!
excellent prof, very very helpful~must talk to her if having any questions or difficulties, she will definitely help u out!
